definition: to hold/to contain/to grasp/to take hold of/handle/particle marking the following noun as a direct object/classifier for objects with handle/classifier for small objects: handful
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
the person in charge/the head of the leadership group
erhua variant of 搭把手[da1 ba3 shou3]

sentences.english: And the pump has a wooden handle to prevent burns to the hands.
sentences.chinese: 而且抽气筒还安有一个木制的把手用来防止手被烫伤。

sentences.english: Most boys keep them locked in their lockers and they're turned off.
sentences.chinese: 大多数男孩子把手机锁在储物柜里，并把手机关掉。

sentences.english: Roger went across to the bed and put his hand on her arm.It was cold.
sentences.chinese: 罗杰走到床前把手放在她的手臂上，尸体已经冷了。

sentences.english: They could soon take it to the next level by excising the traditional navigation toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 下一步他们很快就会把手伸向现存的传统导航工具栏。

sentences.english: Each of us dipped a finger into the mixture and sucked it.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都把手伸进怀子里沾一下并品尝。

sentences.english: Just reach into the powder and pull out your wrench.
sentences.chinese: 把手伸到粉末里把你的扳手拿出来。

sentences.english: Only China is in a position to act as a second engine of global growth.
sentences.chinese: 只有中国在扮演着全球经济增长的第二把手的地位。

sentences.english: I happened to touch a hot pan and burnt my finger.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心碰到热锅上，把手给烫伤了。

sentences.english: They threw their hands in the air.
sentences.chinese: 他们把手放开伸在空中。

sentences.english: The hammer is a metal ball attached to a wire and a handle.
sentences.chinese: 链球是一个连接了一根铁链和把手的金属球。

sentences.english: The contents of the pan began to boil, and he turned to plunge his hand into the bowl;
sentences.chinese: 锅里的东西开始烧滚了，他转过来把手朝盆里伸。

sentences.english: A hold created with a hamer and chisel by a moron uncapable of doing the climb as it is.
sentences.chinese: 用锤子或凿子凿出来的把手点，是一种低能的行为。

sentences.english: Westmoreland jams a crowbar into the door handle.
sentences.chinese: Westmoreland用一根撬棍塞住门把手。

sentences.english: Fuck the priests who put their hands down some innocent child's pants.
sentences.chinese: 操那些神父，把手伸进那些天真孩子的裤裆。

sentences.english: Abraham makes his servant put his hand under his thigh while swearing to God.
sentences.chinese: 亚伯拉罕让他的仆人把手放在他的大腿下向上帝发誓。

sentences.english: Place your hand on top of your head, smile, now start humming.
sentences.chinese: 把手放置于你的头顶，微笑着，开始哼歌。

definition: to reach out with one's hand/to hold out a hand/(fig.) to beg/to get involved/to meddle
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
